Checking Account Balance after Withdrawal
testcase.system-out: @balance_check @withdrawal Scenario: Checking Account Balance after Withdrawal &amp#27;[90m# bank/bank.feature:33&amp#27;[0m &amp#27;[32mGiven &amp#27;[0m&amp#27;[32mmy checking account has a balance of $&amp#27;[0m&amp#27;[32m&amp#27;[1m500&amp#27;[0m &amp#27;[90m# bank.StepDefinitions.myCheckingAccountHasABalanceOf$(int)&amp#27;[0m &amp#27;[32mAnd &amp#27;[0m&amp#27;[32mI have recently made a withdrawal of $&amp#27;[0m&amp#27;[32m&amp#27;[1m100&amp#27;[0m &amp#27;[90m# bank.StepDefinitions.iHaveRecentlyMadeAWithdrawalOf$(int)&amp#27;[0m &amp#27;[32mWhen &amp#27;[0m&amp#27;[32mI check my account balance&amp#27;[0m &amp#27;[90m# bank.StepDefinitions.iCheckMyAccountBalance()&amp#27;[0m &amp#27;[32mThen &amp#27;[0m&amp#27;[32mI should see $&amp#27;[0m&amp#27;[32m&amp#27;[1m400&amp#27;[0m&amp#27;[32m as the balance&amp#27;[0m &amp#27;[90m# bank.StepDefinitions.iShouldSee$AsTheBalance(int)&amp#27;[0m &amp#27;[32mBut &amp#27;[0m&amp#27;[32mthere is a credit interest of $&amp#27;[0m&amp#27;[32m&amp#27;[1m50&amp#27;[0m &amp#27;[90m# bank.StepDefinitions.thereIsACreditInterestOf$(int)&amp#27;[0m &amp#27;[32mAnd &amp#27;[0m&amp#27;[32mthe available balance should be $&amp#27;[0m&amp#27;[32m&amp#27;[1m450&amp#27;[0m &amp#27;[90m# bank.StepDefinitions.theAvailableBalanceShouldBe$(int)&amp#27;[0m

testcase.system-out: @balance_check Scenario: Checking Account Balance after Withdrawal In-Sufficient Balance &amp#27;[90m# bank/bank.feature:41&amp#27;[0m &amp#27;[32mGiven &amp#27;[0m&amp#27;[32mmy checking account has a balance of $&amp#27;[0m&amp#27;[32m&amp#27;[1m500&amp#27;[0m &amp#27;[90m# bank.StepDefinitions.myCheckingAccountHasABalanceOf$(int)&amp#27;[0m &amp#27;[32mWhen &amp#27;[0m&amp#27;[32mI request to withdraw $&amp#27;[0m&amp#27;[32m&amp#27;[1m700&amp#27;[0m &amp#27;[90m# bank.StepDefinitions.iRequestToWithdraw$(int)&amp#27;[0m >> Error: Withdrawal not allowed due to insufficient funds. << &amp#27;[32mThen &amp#27;[0m&amp#27;[32mI should see an Error&amp#27;[0m &amp#27;[90m# bank.StepDefinitions.iShouldSeeAnError()&amp#27;[0m &amp#27;[32mAnd &amp#27;[0m&amp#27;[32mthe available balance should be $&amp#27;[0m&amp#27;[32m&amp#27;[1m500&amp#27;[0m &amp#27;[90m# bank.StepDefinitions.theAvailableBalanceShouldBe$(int)&amp#27;[0m
